body:
Made the following changes:

- [x] Updated to `AutotoolsPackage`
- [x] Removed `autogen.sh` stage and autotools deps, already comes with a `configure` script
- [x] Introduced hack to work around concretization bug (see #2632, thanks to @davydden for the solution)
- [x] Build in serial to avoid installation problems (this is the real reason I started hacking on this package)
- [x] Build shared libraries, not just static
title: Various improvements to H5hut
